title: idk wut AMA is but AMA for Clickn i guess ;D

replies.body:
AMA = Ask me Anything

Here's my question, what's your favourite thing on Avicus?
replies.body_tagged:
AMA = Ask me Anything

Here's my question, what's your favourite thing on Avicus?

replies.body:
OOOH THX FOR THE ANSWER GODLY COW MAN

Anyways, my favorite thing on Avicus are the players, most of them aren't that toxic and the staff are very friendly ;o
also tehy knowz m3mez

replies.body:
Hehe, quite funny actually. 

I was looking for some skywars servers, and i stumbled across a trailer for a Skywars server, it looked very awesome as it had Team Skywars, which pretty much only few servers had ;/. 
It was skywars.co(old avicus ip). I decided to join it and play skywars, but there weren't skywars lmao. So i decided to play something called Nebula as I never heard of it before ;o. And wallal, 

btw Avicus was one of my first servers ever :O

replies.body: When did u start getting into minecraft?
replies.body_tagged: When did u start getting into minecraft?

replies.body:
Back in 2011, I was casually looking through Youtube and I saw a video called X's  Adventures In Minecraft cuz it got alot of views so it must be good XD, link here lol
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4bh4EexJO4I
And I decided to watch it ;o I really liked it and actually wanted to get it, but at the time, I didn't have a pc and my dads pc was a potato. 
So then into 2013, I was scrolling around Youtube and saw a another video, Then i discovered CaptainSparklez, then i decided I want to get it, as I got my first pc at the time, So i asked it for my birthday.. So in 2014, finally got it :D.

Pretty much in 2011 and because of davidangel64 ,
